DOC.HEADLINE: ATHLETES OF THE WEEK
DOC.TEXT: Gil Gonzales Orange , Sr . Basketball / Guard Gonzales led Orange County with 92 three-point baskets last season . Although that pace has slowed , Orange coaches are happier with Gonzales ' play because of his improved defense , rebounding , passing and shooting percentage . Friday , against then-No . 3 Santa Ana Valley , Gonzales had 22 points , including five three-pointers , and a season-high 12 rebounds as the Panthers won , 64-58 , and moved_into sole possession of first place in the Century League . Wednesday , Gonzales had 15 points and seven rebounds in a 61-56 victory over El Modena . Other notables : * Greg Abbott , Troy , who averaged 22 points in Freeway League victories over Sunny Hills and Fullerton . * Jason Fikse , Esperanza , posted his third and fourth consecutive Empire League shutouts , a 0-0 tie with Los Alamitos and 2-0 over Loara . * Judd Nester , Capistrano Valley , scored two goals in a 4-0 soccer victory over Dana Hills and one in a 3-0 victory over then-No . 1 Mater Dei . * Ali Ton , Los Alamitos , had 24 points and 11 assists in a 77-59 victory over Katella and seven points and 10 assists in a 69-41 victory over Esperanza .
